nodes.text: A probe droid was stationed on the Separatist-controlled planet Ryloth around 22 BBY at the time of the Battle of Ryloth.

After the forces of the Grand Army of the Republic broke the blockade of the planet and successfully landed ground forces on the surface of Ryloth, this recon droid surveilled and recorded Jedi General Mace Windu and Clone Commander Ponds discussing their plans to retake the capital city of Lessu. The droid transmitted the information back to Techno Union foreman Wat Tambor, giving him time to plunder what riches he could and make plans to escape the planet.
